default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: What are you doing? I'm a serious businessman. If you keep this up, I'm calling my lawyer! Help! Help! Assault! ...Of course I know lawyers can't come here. You really have no sense of humor...

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: There's nothing fun about becoming strong in and of itself, but after becoming strong, you will have more ways to seek out fun.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: You give me things all day without taking any of my money... What's in it for you? Could it be that you want me? You gotta be careful then, because I will ultimately leave after I've had my fun...

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Hey, want to know what you can buy from me... with your life?

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Woohoo! I made a killing this time!

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: I lost a fortune! I'm not coming back.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Everything of yours is mine now!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Fair enough……

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Hey, when can I go out? If I don't find some clients soon, my factory is going to go bankrupt... Alternatively, you can place some orders with me.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: You gotta make friends to succeed in business, and to make friends, you gotta have fun with them. Who wouldn't seal a deal with you after having loads of fun together?

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: When you have money, flies will swarm around you. But flies can also be fun, don't you think?

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: I have a friend, a painter, who admires my physique and uses me as a canvas. Body art! You understand art? Though it smudges off with one wipe of detergent, I like to keep my friend happy. That way, maybe he'll buy a decade worth of paints from me...

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: I haven't been out for so long. My factory has taken a huge hit as a result. Chief, how will you compensate me?

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: I don't view greed as a sin. To feel satisfied when you get what you want, to feel happy when you see things go your way... Isn't this human nature?

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Talking about money is the most boring part of business. I prefer something else... like offering a deal that cannot be refused, then watching the other person hand over something they cherish deeply with a look of utmost pain and despair... Now that is addictive.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: I've been wondering what your deepest desire is... what must I rob you of to enjoy a look of remorse and despair on your face? But I give up, because you are just like me. There is a bottomless void in your heart... Hahahaha.

default.title: Idle
default.text: I haven't sealed a single deal since coming here?! No... I gotta find Faye tomorrow... She's beautiful inside and out. Surely she will do something about this!

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: 200 for one time... Just kidding, I wouldn't dream of sealing such a petty deal with you! If you sign this contract, feel free to touch whenever you want! It's all on me!

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Are you here to discuss business? Wait a bit, I'm busy watching this livestream. Hehe, this girl ain't bad. Let me send her some gifts...

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: What a coincidence! I happen to have a friend there. Leave it to him!

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Hello? Oh, it's done? Great! Chief, it's done over there! Everything went according to plan!

default.title: Level Up
default.text: I don't need to pay for this? Are you serious?

default.title: Deploy
default.text: You go to such dangerous places just for fun? Wow, you have my respect.
